title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.5 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations
(a) Requests for public access to records
shall be accepted and records produced during all hours the division is
regularly open for business. (b) Copies of records will be provided in accordance with section
2657.11
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2657.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
